name: Introduction to Mobile Industrial Robots
prereq: Knowledge of Java equivalent to completion of Computer Science  9G
descrp: Introductory course in the hardware and software design of autonomous vehicles. Basic concepts of sensors, actuators, navigation, exploration, feedback control, and communications. Object-oriented software design principles. Programming for real-time control using Java. Laboratory project teams will design, build, program, and test small prototype vehicles for material handling systems and other applications.
